title: Mövenpick Resort Phan Thiet
description:
Facing the beachfront, Mövenpick Resort Phan Thiet offers 5-star accommodation in Phan Thiet and has an outdoor swimming pool, fitness centre and garden. Boasting a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. The accommodation offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a balcony and a private bathroom with a bidet. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe.

Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, continental and American options.

Mövenpick Resort Phan Thiet offers a children's playground.

Tien Thanh Beach is 300 metres from the accommodation, while Phan Thiet Train Station is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vung Tau Airport, 143 km from Mövenpick Resort Phan Thiet.

title: Ocean Vista Mui Ne - SeaLinks City
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Ocean Vista Mui Ne - SeaLinks City! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Located 200 m from Ong Dia Rock Beach, Ocean Vista Mui Ne - SeaLinks City offers a garden, and air-conditioned accommodation with a balcony and free WiFi.

Each unit comes with a terrace offering city views, a cable flat-screen TV, a dining area, a well-fitted kitchen and a private bathroom with shower and slippers. A fridge, an oven and microwave are also provided, as well as a kettle.

Sea Link Golf Course is 8.3 km from the apartment, while Fairy Spring is 8.9 km away. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 138 km from Ocean Vista Mui Ne - SeaLinks City.

title: LAGI FARMSTAY
description:
Situated in Vĩnh Thạnh, 1.6 km from Cam Binh Beach, LAGI FARMSTAY features air-conditioned accommodation and a garden. This pet-friendly resort also has free WiFi.

At the resort, the rooms come with a patio with pool view. All rooms will provide guests with an oven.

A buffet breakfast is available each morning at LAGI FARMSTAY.

Ta Cu Moutain is 34 km from the accommodation, while Ke Ga Lighthouse is 40 km from the property. The nearest airport is Vung Tau Airport, 87 km from LAGI FARMSTAY.

title: TTC Hotel Phan Thiet
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at TTC Hotel Phan Thiet! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Standing tall on Nguyen Tat Thanh street, TTC Hotel Phan Thiet overlooks the ocean and ancient volcanic mountains in Phan Thiet city. The hotel features an outdoor swimming, on-site restaurant and a garden. Guests can enjoy free parking on site.

With accents of purple from the fabrics and brown from the dark wood furnishings, all units enjoy free WiFi access and air conditioning. All large units feature windows offering city/sea views, a seating area and minibar. En suite bathroom is equipped with a bathtub, free toiletries and a hairdryer.

You can fill many restaurants and shops in the surrounding. Facing Doi Duong Beach, TTC Hotel Phan Thiet is a 5-minute drive from Phan Thiet Railway Station, while Mui Ne is a 40-minute drive away.

Guests can head for a tennis game, or enjoy a rejunevating massage at the spa. Staff at the 24-hour reception can arrange water facilities upon request, such as snorkelling, windsurfing, deep-sea fishing and scuba diving. Car hire and luggage storage are available.

Oriental Restaurant features à la carte menus and serves an array of Asian and European dishes. Room service is also possible.

title: Radisson Resort Phan Thiet
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Radisson Resort Phan Thiet! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Facing the beachfront, Radisson Resort Phan Thiet offers 4-star accommodation in Phan Thiet and features free bikes, outdoor swimming pool and fitness centre. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel has a garden and a bar. The accommodation provides room service and a 24-hour front desk for guests.

At the hotel, every room is fitted with a desk.

The daily breakfast offers buffet, American or Asian options. At Radisson Resort Phan Thiet you will find a restaurant serving American, Austrian and Asian cuisine. Vegetarian and vegan options can also be requested.

The accommodation offers a children's playground.

Phan Thiet Train Station is 14 km from Radisson Resort Phan Thiet, while Binh Thuan Bus Station is 15 km away. The nearest airport is Vung Tau Airport, 142 km from the hotel.

title: RUBENS BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at RUBENS BOUTIQUE HOTEL! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Set in Phan Thiet, 500 metres from Doi Duong Beach, RUBENS BOUTIQUE HOTEL offers accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The property is located 2.2 km from Thuong Chanh Beach, 500 metres from Sea Link Golf Course and 3.1 km from Phan Thiet Train Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. With a private bathroom fitted with a shower and slippers, some units at the hotel also have a city view.

Binh Thuan Bus Station is 3.2 km from RUBENS BOUTIQUE HOTEL, while Fairy Spring is 18 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 138 km from the accommodation.

title: Mandala Cham Bay Mui Ne
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Mandala Cham Bay Mui Ne! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Located in Phan Thiet, 600 m from Long Son Beach, Mandala Cham Bay Mui Ne provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a restaurant. This 5-star hotel features a spa experience, with its sauna and hot tub. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

Some rooms are equipped with a kitchenette with a minibar and a stovetop.

Guests at the hotel can enjoy a buffet breakfast.

Mandala Cham Bay Mui Ne offers a sun terrace.

Red Sand Dunes Beach is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Fairy Spring is 16 km away. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 113 km from Mandala Cham Bay Mui Ne.

title: Nhà nghỉ Hùng Hoa
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Nhà nghỉ Hùng Hoa! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Set in Phan Thiet, within 700 metres of Doi Duong Beach and 2.5 km of Sea Link Golf Course, Nhà nghỉ Hùng Hoa offers accommodation with a garden as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property has sea and mountain views, and is 4.5 km from Binh Thuan Bus Station. The guest house features family rooms.

All units feature air conditioning and a cable flat-screen TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a walk-in shower and slippers, units at the guest house also have free WiFi, while some rooms also offer a terrace. At the guest house, the units have bed linen and towels.

Phan Thiet Train Station is 4.7 km from the guest house, while Fairy Spring is 17 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 139 km from Nhà nghỉ Hùng Hoa.

title: Muine Bay Resort
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Muine Bay Resort! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Steps from the beach, Muine Bay Resort offers a tranquil garden and green landscape. The resort features spacious units with private balconies. Featuring an outdoor pool with a bar, it provides free WiFi and complimentary shuttle service to Ham Tien Beach, located 10 km away.

Boasting modern interiors, air-conditioned rooms have dark wood furnishings and flat-screen cable TVs. A fridge, safe and a hairdryer are provided.

Guests can get an active workout at the tennis court or take a dip in the spa pool. Added conveniences include a business centre and a tour desk.

A range of Asian dishes can be sampled in the casual open-air environment of Hall Restaurant. The beach bar is ideal for barbecue gatherings.

Muine Bay Resort is 2 km from the Red Sand Dunes and Mui Ne Local Market. It is 30 km from Phan Thiet City and provides free parking.

title: Biệt thự Domaine Mũi Né
description:
Situated in Ấp Ngọc Hải, 1.3 km from Ong Dia Rock Beach and 7.5 km from Sea Link Golf Course, Biệt thự Domaine Mũi Né offers air conditioning. This property offers access to a balcony, free private parking and free WiFi. Fairy Spring is 11 km away and Ke Ga Lighthouse is 42 km from the villa.

The spacious villa has a terrace, 3 bedrooms, a living room and a well-equipped kitchen. A flat-screen TV is available. The property offers garden views.

Binh Thuan Bus Station is 8.9 km from the villa, while Phan Thiet Train Station is 10 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 138 km from Biệt thự Domaine Mũi Né.

title: Every Day Guest House - Phan Thiet
description:
Set in Ấp Bình Hưng, within 2.2 km of Doi Duong Beach and 1.3 km of Binh Thuan Bus Station, Every Day Guest House - Phan Thiet offers accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is around 2.8 km from Phan Thiet Train Station, 18 km from Fairy Spring and 35 km from Ke Ga Lighthouse. The property is non-smoking and is located 2.5 km from Sea Link Golf Course.

The units come with air conditioning, a fridge, a stovetop, a kettle, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Every room includes a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. At the guest house every room comes with bed linen and towels.

An American breakfast is available every morning at Every Day Guest House - Phan Thiet.

Ta Cu Moutain is 35 km from the accommodation, while Binh Thuan Post Office is 1.7 km away. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 136 km from Every Day Guest House - Phan Thiet.

title: Paris Hotel Bình Thuận
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Paris Hotel Bình Thuận! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Paris Hotel Bình Thuận is a 3-star property situated in Tuy Phong, facing the beach. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a shared lounge and room service. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and organising tours for guests.

The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Paris Hotel Bình Thuận offers some rooms with city views, and all rooms come with a kettle. At the accommodation rooms include bed linen and towels.

White Sand Dunes is 23 km from Paris Hotel Bình Thuận, while Red Sand Dunes is 46 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 113 km from the hotel.

title: Thanh Binh Hotel
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Thanh Binh Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Set in La Gi, 29 km from Ta Cu Moutain, Thanh Binh Hotel offers accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a terrace and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi.

At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, the units at Thanh Binh Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels.

Ke Ga Lighthouse is 36 km from Thanh Binh Hotel. The nearest airport is Vung Tau Airport, 93 km from the hotel.

title: Huy Đạt Hotel
description:
Set within 2.4 km of Thuong Chanh Beach and 3.2 km of Phan Thiet Train Station, Huy Đạt Hotel offers rooms in Phan Thiet. Among the facilities at this property are room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Certain units at the property feature a balcony with a city view.

At the hotel, all rooms come with a wardrobe. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a shower and a hairdryer, the units at Huy Đạt Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms will provide you with a terrace. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Doi Duong Beach, Sea Link Golf Course and Binh Thuan Post Office. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 138 km from Huy Đạt Hotel.

title: Hoang An Hotel
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hoang An Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Located in La Gi, 28 km from Ta Cu Moutain, Hoang An Hotel provides accommodation with a garden, free private parking, a shared lounge and a restaurant. Providing a bar, the property is located within 34 km of Ke Ga Lighthouse. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property.

At the hotel every room is equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a terrace with a garden view, a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV, bed linen and towels. All units in Hoang An Hotel are equipped with free toiletries and an iPod docking station.

Breakfast is available daily, and includes à la carte, continental and Asian options.

The accommodation offers a children's playground.

The nearest airport is Vung Tau Airport, 93 km from Hoang An Hotel.

title: Centara Mirage Resort Mui Ne
displayLocation: East Ham Tien Beach, Mui Ne
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Centara Mirage Resort Mui Ne! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Situated in Mui Ne, a few steps from Ham Tien Beach, Centara Mirage Resort Mui Ne features accommodation with free bikes, free private parking, an outdoor swimming pool and a fitness centre. Boasting a kids' club, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant, a water park and a terrace. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

Guests at the resort can enjoy a buffet or an Asian breakfast.

Centara Mirage Resort Mui Ne offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and car hire is available at this 5-star resort.

Fairy Spring is 1.6 km from the accommodation, while Sea Link Golf Course is 20 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 127 km from Centara Mirage Resort Mui Ne.

title: villa Mui Ne Sealinks PE85
description:
Situated in Ấp Ngọc Hải in the Binh Thuan region, with Ong Dia Rock Beach and Poshanu Tower nearby, villa Mui Ne Sealinks PE85 features accommodation with free private parking. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and a shared kitchen, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The rooftop pool features a pool bar and fence.

The spacious villa features 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, bed linen, towels, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, and a terrace with sea views. This villa also includes a balcony that doubles up as an outdoor dining area. The villa is allergy-free and soundproof.

A children's playground is also available at villa Mui Ne Sealinks PE85, while guests can also relax in the garden.

Ham Tien Beach is 2.7 km from the accommodation, while Sea Link Golf Course is 8.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 139 km from villa Mui Ne Sealinks PE85.

title: Villa Aria Boutique Muine
displayLocation: Central Mui Ne Beach, Mui Ne
description:
Villa Aria Muine is a stylish boutique beach resort located next to Phan Thiet Beach, a 15-minute drive from Phan Thiet City. Offering views of the sea and bay of Mui Ne, it features a private beach area, a restaurant and an outdoor pool. Free parking and free Wi-Fi access are provided.

The guest rooms feature a blend of tropical and French-style decor, and are fully air conditioned. Spacious rooms offer amenities such as a personal safe, a minibar and a flat-screen TV with cable channels.

Guests can enjoy massages or swim in the outdoor pool. The staff at the tour desk can assist with making travel arrangements.

Aria Restaurant and Bar features an al fresco dining area, and serves Asian and western cuisine. A daily buffet breakfast is featured.

Aria Villa Muine is a 5-minute drive from Sealinks Golf Course and 6 km from Poshanu Cham Tower. It is a 15-minute drive from Phan Thiet Train Station and the Ham Tien Local Market. Bau Sen and Bau Trang are both a 45-minute drive away.

title: Sandunes Beach Resort & Spa
description:
Offering access to a private beach, Sandunes Beach Resort is a luxurious property with rooms, suites and bungalows boasting a sea view balcony and free WiFi. It also features an outdoor pool and restaurant.

Located in Mui Ne, Sandunes Beach Resort is found at the foot of Red Hill. Storm Kiteboarding Centre is 6.4 km away while Surfpoint Kiteboarding Centre is 7.3 km away. This resort is 90 km from Lien Khuong Airport.

Every room, suite and bungalow is air-conditioned and comes with a flat-screen satellite/cable TV, safe, minibar and an electric kettle. A sitting area and private bathroom with shower, bathtub, hairdryer and free toiletries are included.

Other facilities include a shared lounge, ticket service and tour desk. Guests can relax with a massage at the spa during their stay.

title: Minh Hoàng Hotel- Spa
description:
Minh Hoàng Hotel- Spa is set in Ấp Bình Hưng, 2.6 km from Doi Duong Beach and offers air-conditioned accommodation with free WiFi, as well as access to a terrace.

There is a private bathroom with bidet in all units, along with free toiletries and slippers.

Popular points of interest near the bed and breakfast include Binh Thuan Bus Station, Phan Thiet Train Station and Binh Thuan Post Office. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 136 km from Minh Hoàng Hotel- Spa.

title: Pandanus Resort
description:
4-star comfort awaits at Pandanus Resort, 1.6 km from Mui Ne Market. Boasting a 10-hectare tropical garden, this beachfront resort offers a large free-form outdoor pool and, a hot tub for a dozen guests and 2 on-site dining options. Guests can enjoy free use of bicycle and free shuttle bus to Ham Tien Beach.

Adorned in pleasant cream shade with splashes of yellow, light brown and black, all units at Pandanus Resort enjoy free WiFi access and air conditioning. A wardrobe with personal safe, cable flat-screen TV and minibar are included. Certain units feature either a private terrace or balcony with outdoor furniture and offer views of the garden. En suite bathroom comes with a walk-in shower and free toiletries.

Guests can head to Pandanus's spa centre to pamper with a wide range of rejuvenating and restorative treatmens, or enjoy sauna/steam bath sessions. Other facilities include a flood-lit tennis court and fitness centre. Staff at the tour desk and 24-hour front desk can assist you with luggage storage, airport transfer and other concierge services.

The 24-hour Café Blue Lagoon Restaurant serves an array of authentic Vietnamese dishes and European delights, while the pool-side Sun Terrace Restaurant offers BBQ buffet, snacks and light lunch.

Storm Kiteboarding Center is 6.4 km from Pandanus Resort, while Surfpoint Kiteboarding Center is 7.3 km away.

title: Catsen Bungalows & Pool Phan Thiet
description:
Situated in Phan Thiet, a few steps from Ham Tien Beach, Catsen Bungalows & Pool Phan Thiet features accommodation with a garden, free private parking and a shared lounge. Among the facilities at this property are a concierge service and a tour desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and currency exchange for guests.

Some rooms have a kitchenette with a fridge, an oven and a stovetop.

The hotel offers a sun terrace. You can play darts at Catsen Bungalows & Pool Phan Thiet, and the area is popular for cycling.

Fairy Spring is 3.6 km from the accommodation, while Sea Link Golf Course is 13 km from the property. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 132 km from Catsen Bungalows & Pool Phan Thiet.

title: Mui Ne Hills Backpackers
displayLocation: Central Mui Ne Beach, Mui Ne
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Mui Ne Hills Backpackers! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Located on top of a 300-meter sand dunes hill, Mui Ne Hills Backpackers offers accommodation with free WiFi access throughout the property. It features an outdoor pool and 24 hours check-in service. The hotel is just a 10-minute walk away from the nearest beach.

Mui Ne Hills Backpackers offers air-conditioned private rooms with cable TV, minibar and en-suite bathrooms with rain showers. Dorms are also available with A/C from 17:00 till 9:00.

The next door restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner in both Vietnamese and international styles. Guests have free access to the bar with an open air rooftop spa bath, a second swimming pool and a nightclub.

Guests can book local tours and bus tickets at the tour desk. Airport transfers can be provided at an additional charge. Motorbike rental and luggage storage are available on site.

Fairy Stream is 6 km from Mui Ne Hills Backpackers, while Sea Link Golf Course is 5 km away.

title: Home Stay Sen biển
description:
Home Stay Sen biển, a property with a garden and a bar, is located in Ấp Thiện Phước, 1.2 km from Ong Dia Rock Beach, 7.1 km from Fairy Spring, as well as 10 km from Sea Link Golf Course. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. Binh Thuan Bus Station is 11 km away and Phan Thiet Train Station is 12 km from the apartment.

All of the air-conditioned units feature a private bathroom, flat-screen TV, fully equipped kitchen and terrace.

Ke Ga Lighthouse is 44 km from the apartment, while Ta Cu Moutain is 45 km away. The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 138 km from Home Stay Sen biển.

title: Hoang Dang Hotel
description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Hoang Dang Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.

Located in Tuy Phong, 43 km from White Sand Dunes, Hoang Dang Hotel provides accommodation with a shared lounge, free private parking and a terrace. With free WiFi, this 2-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Certain units at the property include a balcony with a city view.

All units are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a kettle, a shower, a hairdryer and a wardrobe. At the hotel every room is fitted with bed linen and towels.

The nearest airport is Lien Khuong Airport, 131 km from Hoang Dang Hotel.
